Actions.Name: Righteous Fist
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage to weakened foes.

Actions.Name: Community Watch
Actions.Description: Shove all allies in range 2 1 space towards this character, then any adjacent allies gain 2 vigor.

Actions.Name: Bale
Actions.Description: The [name] uses a pitchfork, shovel, or sheer strength and picks up an adjacent character size 1 or smaller, removing them from the battlefield and placing them in an adjacent space, then shoving them 1. Weakened foes are shoved 3 instead.

Actions.Name: On the Chin
Actions.Description: The [name] gains aura 1. The [name] and allies in the aura are sturdy, and gain 3 vigor at the start of the [name]'s turn.
